title: Systems Engineer
responsibilities: I am Systems Engineer and focuses mainly on Automation Products. However, our roles does not limit with our Automation but also with other products that the company offers.

title: Freelance UI/UX Specialist
responsibilities: I am a Freelance UI/UX Specialist and focuses mainly on creating UI/UX Designs for Websites and Mobile Applications. During my Freelance, I have worked with multiple clients and have created multiple UI/UX Designs for their Websites and Mobile Applications. My clients are mostly from Upwork and some of it are external/internal/referral clients

title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Created an e-commerce application that focuses on locally based stores in Baguio using Flutter and Dart Language. Also created an Admin Panel that is accessible via Local Host using a React Framework called NextJS. Both the mobile application and the web admin panel are powered by Firebase using its own Firebase Firestore and Firebase Authentication.

title: Project Based Freelance as UI/UX Designer
responsibilities: A friend of mine referred me to this position and we both worked on the same client. He used to create UI Designs and I worked on UX Designs and Workflow of the Application. We managed to finish some products that our client liked and built a good relationship with them.

title: Data Engineer Intern
responsibilities: During the OJT period, we were assigned to create a dashboard that had been given by the company as our resource to create a visualization of the raw data. We used Google Data Studio for connecting the database and created different kinds of graphs to make the data more readable. With the dashboard, they can now analyze and make better decisions on what to improve and what to learn more.
company: SP Madrid and Associates Law Firm
